menuItems.name: Pancakes
menuItems.description: Fluffy pancakes served with butter and maple syrup, often accompanied by bacon or sausage.

menuItems.name: Eggs Benedict
menuItems.description: Poached eggs served on English muffins with Canadian bacon or ham, topped with hollandaise sauce.

menuItems.name: Omelets
menuItems.description: Fluffy eggs folded over a variety of fillings such as cheese, vegetables, bacon, ham, or mushrooms.

menuItems.name: French Toast
menuItems.description: Slices of bread dipped in a mixture of eggs and milk, then grilled until golden brown and served with syrup and powdered sugar.

menuItems.name: Breakfast Burrito
menuItems.description: Tortilla filled with scrambled eggs, cheese, potatoes, and a choice of bacon, sausage, or chorizo, often served with salsa and sour cream.

menuItems.name: Bagel with Lox
menuItems.description: Toasted bagel topped with cream cheese, smoked salmon (lox), capers, red onion, and sometimes tomato slices.

menuItems.name: Biscuits and Gravy
menuItems.description: Flaky biscuits topped with creamy sausage gravy, served hot and often accompanied by eggs.

menuItems.name: Belgian Waffles
menuItems.description: Crispy waffles topped with whipped cream, fresh berries, and maple syrup.

menuItems.name: Breakfast Sandwich
menuItems.description: English muffin, biscuit, or croissant filled with eggs, cheese, and a choice of sausage, bacon, or ham.

menuItems.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
menuItems.description: Layers of Greek yogurt, granola, and fresh berries or fruit, sometimes drizzled with honey or maple syrup.

menuItems.name: Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Classic American favorite, typically served with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles,and condiments on a bun.

menuItems.name: Club Sandwich
menuItems.description: Triple-decker sandwich with layers of turkey or chicken, bacon, lettuce, tomato,and mayo on toasted bread.

menuItems.name: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese,often topped with grilled chicken or shrimp.

menuItems.name: BBQ Ribs
menuItems.description: Slow-cooked pork or beef ribs slathered in barbecue sauce, served with coleslaw and cornbread.

menuItems.name: Philly Cheese-steak
menuItems.description: Sliced steak, often with grilled onions and peppers, topped with melted cheese on a hoagie roll.

menuItems.name: New England Clam Chowder
menuItems.description: Cream-based soup with clams, potatoes, onions, and celery, seasoned with herbs and spices.

menuItems.name: Cobb Salad
menuItems.description: Mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, blue cheese, and vinaigrette dressing.

menuItems.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
menuItems.description:
Slow-cooked pork shoulder shredded and mixed with barbecue sauce,
served on a bun with pickles and coleslaw.

menuItems.name: Fish Tacos
menuItems.description: Soft corn tortillas filled with grilled or fried fish, cabbage slaw, avocado, salsa, and lime.

menuItems.name: Shrimp Scampi
menuItems.description: Shrimp saut√©ed in garlic butter and white wine sauce, served over linguine pasta with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese and parsley.

menuItems.name: BBQ Brisket
menuItems.description: Slow-smoked beef brisket served with coleslaw, baked beans, cornbread, and pickles.

menuItems.name: Vegetarian Lasagna
menuItems.description: Layers of pasta filled with ricotta cheese, spinach, mushrooms, and marinara sauce, topped with mozzarella cheese and baked until golden.

menuItems.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
menuItems.description: Bell peppers stuffed with a mixture of ground beef or turkey, rice, tomatoes, and cheese, baked until tender.

menuItems.name: Lobster Tail Dinner
menuItems.description: Broiled or grilled lobster tail served with drawn butter, roasted potatoes or rice, steamed vegetables, and a wedge of lemon.

menuItems.name: Taco Night
menuItems.description: Build-your-own taco dinner with seasoned ground beef or chicken, soft or crispy taco shells, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, sour cream, and guacamole.

menuItems.name: Buffalo Wings
menuItems.description: Deep-fried chicken wings coated in spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

menuItems.name: Steakhouse Dinner
menuItems.description: A classic American favorite featuring a grilled steak (such as ribeye, filet mignon, or New York strip) served with sides like mashed potatoes, steamed vegetables, and a salad.

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled and served with rice pilaf or roasted potatoes, steamed asparagus, and a lemon wedge.

menuItems.name: Roast Chicken
menuItems.description: Herb-roasted or rotisserie chicken served with mashed potatoes, gravy, roasted vegetables, and a side of cranberry sauce.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
menuItems.description: Spaghetti pasta topped with marinara sauce and meatballs, served with garlic bread and a side salad.

menuItems.name: Coffee
menuItems.description: Whether black, with cream and sugar, or as specialty drinks like lattes and cappuccinos

menuItems.name: Iced Tea
menuItems.description: Served sweetened or unsweetened with a lemon

menuItems.name: Soda (Soft Drinks)
menuItems.description: Varieties like cola (Coca-Cola, Pepsi), lemon-lime (Sprite, 7UP), root beer

menuItems.name: Craft Beer
menuItems.description: With a growing craft brewery scene

menuItems.name: Bottled Water
menuItems.description: Both still or sparkling
